Container.Name: AnythingLLM
Container.Overview: The all-in-one AI app for any LLM with full RAG and AI Agent capabilities.
Container.Requires: Before installing, you must create the following files: - `touch .env` at /mnt/user/appdata/anythingllm/.env (see https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm/blob/master/docker/.env.example for an example) - `touch anythingllm.db` at /mnt/user/appdata/anythingllm/anythingllm.db
Container.Changes:

### 2024-04-30
